urgent.action: Fix http://www.konacoffeedonut.com/en showing in GSC with 113 impressions at position #12. Ensure 301 redirects from http→https and www→non-www are properly configured. Check Vercel domain settings and add all variants.
urgent.reasoning: 113 impressions (19% of total) are going to a non-HTTPS URL at poor position #12 with 0 clicks. This is splitting link equity and wasting impressions. Fixing redirects consolidates authority to the canonical HTTPS version.

urgent.action: Improve title tag and meta description for /en/about-kona-coffee. Current: 48 impressions, 1 click (2% CTR) at position #5.9. Add compelling copy like 'Authentic Kona Coffee in Waikiki | Opening Feb 2026'.
urgent.reasoning: 48 impressions with only 1 click at position ~6 means the SERP snippet isn't compelling. Improving meta tags could realistically 3-5x clicks from this page alone.

quickWins.action: Optimize homepage and menu page for 'donuts near me' — add structured local business schema, ensure 'donuts near me in Waikiki' appears in H2/body copy, strengthen Google Business Profile with donut-specific categories.
quickWins.reasoning: Position #8.8 with 20 impressions is a high-volume local query. Moving from position 9→5 could increase CTR from 5% to 15%+. This is likely the highest-traffic keyword opportunity.

quickWins.action: Create or enhance a dedicated page section targeting 'donut shops in Waikiki/Honolulu'. Add internal links from menu and homepage. Include location-specific content.
quickWins.reasoning: Position #12 with 6 impressions and 0 clicks. Breaking into top 10 with targeted content could capture local search traffic. Low effort since content structure already exists.

quickWins.action: Ensure singular 'donut' variant is covered in on-page content alongside 'donuts'. Add 'donut near me' to alt text on donut images and in FAQ schema.
quickWins.reasoning: Position #13.7 with 3 impressions. Same intent as 'donuts near me' — improving for one helps both. Small content tweaks can push into page 1.

quickWins.action: Add business hours prominently with structured data (OpeningHoursSpecification). After opening Feb 25, ensure Google Business Profile hours are set so 'open now' queries match.
quickWins.reasoning: Position #6 with 2 impressions — already near top but no clicks. Once actually open, this query becomes high-intent. Prepare structured hours data now.

quickWins.action: Expand Korean content on /ko/about-kona-coffee with more Korean coffee-related keywords. Add Korean meta descriptions. Target '코나 커피', '하와이 커피', '와이키키 도넛' keywords.
quickWins.reasoning: Position #4.8 with 20% CTR shows strong Korean search engagement. Korea is 6% of traffic. Expanding Korean content can capture tourist pre-trip search behavior.

opportunities.action: Set up and fully optimize Google Business Profile before Feb 25 opening. Add all business categories (Coffee Shop, Donut Shop), upload photos, set hours, enable messaging.
opportunities.reasoning: Local 'near me' queries dominate the keyword data. GBP is essential for appearing in local pack results which appear above organic.

opportunities.action: Enhance Japanese /ja/ pages with localized content targeting Japanese tourists. Add FAQ about Kona coffee for Japanese visitors.
opportunities.reasoning: Japan is 5% of impressions. Japanese tourists are a key Waikiki demographic. Multilingual content can capture pre-trip research.

opportunities.action: Create dedicated content around 'hawaiian coffee and donuts' (position #20.4). Blog post or landing page about Hawaiian coffee culture could capture this long-tail traffic.
opportunities.reasoning: 5 impressions at position 20 shows potential. Creating targeted content could move into top 10 for this relevant keyword.

insights.observation: Brand keyword 'kona coffee donut' has 31.4% CTR at position #1 — excellent performance.
insights.suggestion: Focus efforts on non-brand keywords where there's room to grow. Brand awareness is strong.

insights.observation: Desktop (59%) leads impressions but mobile (32%) shows higher CTR (3.1% vs 2.0%).
insights.suggestion: Prioritize mobile UX improvements. Mobile users are more engaged and likely converting to foot traffic.

insights.observation: Korean and Japanese combined = 11% of traffic. Both show strong engagement (20% CTR Korean).
insights.suggestion: Invest in multilingual SEO for tourist market. This is a competitive advantage in Waikiki.

insights.observation: 37 clicks in 7 days before opening shows strong pre-launch interest.
insights.suggestion: Launch email capture or reservation system now to convert interest. Grand opening campaign should be ready.
